channel.title: My monster freezes when i attk it i tried everything!@!@!@@!
channel.description: ok so i get on my guy and type in ::npc 50 to get a king black dragon. i go to attack it and the screen freezes. then i go and set up hp and autospawn and drops and nothing works it still freezes ffs someone help me!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!.

ya the hp is key

@legato wrote:

you have to code your monsters hp lvl, go to the npc.cfg and open it with a notepad and change the hp lvls to the monster. im working on codeing all the monster now
